<A NAME="eolPage234"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	3
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Corporate Bodies
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	A. General Meeting of Shareholders
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Competence
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 8
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The General Meeting of Shareholders
	is the supreme body of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Annual General
<BR>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_150"></A>
	Meeting of
<BR>
	Shareholders
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 9
</B>
<BR>
<BR>
	The Annual General Meeting of Shareholders
	shall be held each year within 6 months after the close of the business year of the Company; at the latest 20 days before the
	meeting, the Business Report, the Compensation Report and the report of the External Auditor shall be made available for inspection
	by the shareholders at the registered office of the Company or be sent to shareholders on request.
</TD>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Extraordinary General
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 10
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Meeting of
</B>
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
<B>
	Shareholders
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Extraordinary General Meetings
	of Shareholders shall take place upon request of the Board of Directors or the External Auditor.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Furthermore, Extraordinary General Meetings of Shareholders shall be convened upon resolution of
	a General Meeting of Shareholders or if it is requested by one or more shareholders who are representing in the aggregate not less
	than 10 % of the share capital and submit a petition signed by such shareholder or shareholders specifying the items for the agenda
	and the proposals.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Convening of General
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 11
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Meetings of
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
<B>
	Shareholders
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	General Meetings of Shareholders shall
	be convened by the Board of Directors, or, if necessary, by the External Auditor, at the latest 20 days before the date of the
	meeting. The meeting shall be convened by way of a notice appearing once in the official publication organ of the Company. Registered
	shareholders may also be informed by mail or by electronic means.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 5; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	4
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage235"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The notice of a meeting shall state the items on the agenda and the proposals of the Board of Directors
	and, as the case may be, of the shareholders who demanded that a General Meeting of Shareholders be convened or that a certain
	item be included in the agenda and, in case of elections, the names of the nominated candidates.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Agenda
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 12
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	One or more shareholders whose combined shareholdings represent an aggregate nominal value of at
	least CHF 10,000.&ndash; may demand that an item be included in the agenda of a General Meeting of Shareholders. Such a demand
	must be made in writing at the latest 60 days before the meeting and shall specify the items and the proposals of such shareholder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No resolution shall be passed at a General Meeting of Shareholders on matters for which no proper
	notice was given. This provision shall not apply to proposals to convene an Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders, to initiate
	a special audit or to appoint an External auditor at the request of a shareholder (article 700 paragraph 3 CO).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Presiding officer,
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 13
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	minutes,
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
<B>
	vote counters
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The General Meeting of Shareholders shall
	take place at the registered office of the Company, unless the Board of Directors decides otherwise. The Chairman of the Board
	of Directors or in his absence the Vice-Chairman or any other member of the Board of Directors designated by the Board of Directors
	shall take the chair.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The presiding officer shall appoint a secretary and the vote counters. The presiding officer and
	the secretary shall sign the minutes.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Proxies
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 14
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	A shareholder may only be represented by his legal representative, another shareholder with the
	right to vote, proxies designated in agreements with or regulations relating to nominees or the Independent Proxy.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors shall specify the requirements regarding powers of attorney and instructions
	and the modalities and other aspects of the proxy in a separate set of regulations; electronic powers of attorney and instructions
	without advanced or qualified electronic signature may also be admitted. The Chairman of the General Meeting of Shareholders shall
	decide whether a proxy will be accepted.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	A general instruction from a shareholder to the Independent Proxy to vote according to the proposals
	of the Board of Directors on (i) matters for which no proper notice was given in the invitation to the General Meeting of Shareholders
	but on which a valid resolution can be passed pursuant to article 700 paragraph 3 CO, or (ii) proposals for additions or amendments
	to matters for which proper notice was given in the invitation but which are submitted after the invitation has been sent or at
	the General Meeting of Shareholders, shall be deemed to be a valid instruction for exercising the voting right.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Voting rights
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 15
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Each share entitles the holder to
	one vote.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Resolutions, elections
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 16
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Unless the law requires otherwise, the General Meeting of Shareholders passes resolutions and elections
	with the absolute majority of the votes represented.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Resolutions and elections shall be taken either on a show of hands or by electronic voting, unless
	the General Meeting of Shareholders decides for, or the presiding officer orders, a ballot.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The presiding officer may at any time have an election or resolution taken on a show of hands or
	electronically repeated by a ballot, if the results of the first vote appear unclear. In such case, the preceding election or resolution
	taken on a show of hands or electronically is deemed not to have taken place.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In case of elections, if no valid election has been made in the first vote and if there is more
	than one candidate, the presiding officer shall order a second vote in which the relative majority shall be decisive.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 7; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	6
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Powers of the General
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 17
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Meeting of
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: 2IN">
<B>
	Shareholders
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The following powers shall be vested exclusively in the General Meeting &#9;of
	Shareholders:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to adopt and amend the Articles of Incorporation;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to elect the members of the Board of Directors, the Chairman of the Board of Directors, the members
	of the Compensation Committee, the Independent Proxy and the External Auditor;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to approve the Management Report and the consolidated financial statements;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to approve the annual financial statements and to decide on the allocation of profits shown on
	the balance sheet, in particular with regard to dividends;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to discharge the members of the Board of Directors and the Executive Committee;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to approve the compensation of the Board of Directors and the Executive Committee pursuant to article
	29 of the Articles of Incorporation;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	g)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to pass resolutions concerning all further matters which by law or the Articles of Incorporation
	are reserved to the authority of the General Meeting of Shareholders.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Special quorum
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 18
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The approval of the least two thirds
	of the votes represented is required for resolutions of the General Meeting of Shareholders on:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	an alteration of the purpose of the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the creation of shares with increased voting powers;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	an implementation of restrictions on the transfer of registered shares and the removal of such
	restrictions;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	an authorized or conditional increase of the share capital;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	an increase of the share capital made through a transformation of reserves, by contribution in
	kind, for the purpose of an acquisition of property and the grant of special rights;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a restriction or suspension of preemptive rights;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	g)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a change of location of the registered office of the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	h)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the dissolution of the Company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	B. Board of Directors
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Number of Directors
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 19
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors shall consist
	of a maximum of 12 members.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Term of office,
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 20
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	External mandates
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The term of office for each member of the Board of Directors shall be 1 year. Re-election is possible.
	A year within the meaning of this provision is the interval between two Annual General Meetings of Shareholders.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The members of the Board of Directors shall automatically retire after the lapse of the 12th year
	of office or, if earlier, after the expiry of the 70th year of age, provided that the retirement shall become effective on the
	date of the next Annual General Meeting of Shareholders following such event.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The members of the Board of Directors may hold no more than the following number of mandates in
	the supreme executive bodies of companies and organizations:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	&ndash;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	up to additional 4 mandates in listed companies;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	&ndash;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	up to 5 mandates in non-listed companies;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	&ndash;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	up to 10 mandates in (i) charitable organizations, (ii) associations or foundations and (iii) other
	non-profit institutions.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Several mandates held in different
	companies of the same group count as 1 mandate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Mandates within companies under
	the direct or indirect control of Syngenta (subsidiaries) or which are not required to be registered in the Swiss Commercial Register
	or a similar foreign register are not limited by numbers.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	A short-term temporary overrun of
	the limitations set forth
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	above by 1 mandate is permissible.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Organization of the
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 21
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Board of Directors
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors shall constitute
	itself, subject to elections by the General Meeting of Shareholders. It elects one Vice-Chairman from among its members. It shall
	appoint a secretary who need not be a member of the Board of Directors.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 9; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	8
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage239"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Convening of meetings
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 22
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Chairman shall convene meetings
	of the Board of Directors if and when the need arises or if a member so requests in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Resolutions
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 23
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors may lay down
	rules on its decision-making mechanism in the regulations governing its internal organization.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Powers of the
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 24
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Board of Directors
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors has in particular the following nontransferable and inalienable duties:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the ultimate direction of the business of the Company and the giving of the necessary directives;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the determination of the organization of the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the administration of accounting, financial control and financial planning;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the appointment and removal of the persons entrusted with the management and representation of
	the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the appointment of an Independent Proxy in cases where the Independent Proxy elected by the General
	Meeting of Shareholders is not capable of acting;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the ultimate supervision of the persons entrusted with the management of the Company, specifically
	in view of their compliance with the law, the Articles of Incorporation, regulations and directives;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	g)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the preparation of the Business Report and the Compensation Report and of the General Meeting of
	Shareholders and the carrying out of the resolutions adopted by the General Meeting of Shareholders;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	h)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the notification of the court if liabilities exceed assets;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the adoption of resolutions concerning the increase of the share capital to the extent that such
	power is vested in the Board of Directors (article 651 paragraph 4 CO), as well as resolutions concerning the confirmation of capital
	increases and respective amendments to the Articles of Incorporation;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	j)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the examination of the professional qualifications of the External Auditor.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In addition the Board of Directors may pass resolutions with respect to all matters which are not
	reserved to the authority of the General Meeting of Shareholders by law or by these Articles of Incorporation.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Signature authority,
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 25
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	delegation of powers
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors determines those of its members as well as those third persons who shall
	have signatory power for the Company and shall further determine the manner in which such persons may sign on behalf of the Company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors may delegate the preparation and implementation of its resolutions to committees,
	individual members of the Board of Directors or third parties and &ndash; subject to compulsory legal requirements &ndash; transfer
	tasks and powers in whole or in part to committees, individual members of the Board of Directors or third parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_151"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	C. Executive Committee
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Delegation of
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 26
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	management and
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<B>
	representation Regulations governing
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<B>
	the internal organization
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors may, subject to
	article 24 hereof and in accordance with regulations governing the internal organization, delegate the management and representation
	of the Company in whole or in part to the Executive Committee.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD>
<B>
</B>
</TD>
<TD>
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors shall issue regulations governing the internal organization; these shall
	set out in detail the powers and organization of the Board of Directors and the competencies and duties of the Executive Committee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_152"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Duration of
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 27
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	employment
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
<B>
	contracts,
<BR>
	External mandates
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Employment contracts with members of the Executive Committee are concluded for an
	indefinite term. The maximum notice period for the Chief Executive Officer and all members of the Executive Committee is 12
	months.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	10
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage241"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The members of the Executive Committee, subject to the approval by the Chairman of the Board of
	Directors, may hold no more than the following number of mandates in the supreme executive bodies of companies and organizations:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	&ndash;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	up to 2 mandates in listed companies;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	&ndash;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	up to 2 mandates in non-listed companies;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	&ndash;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	up to 4 mandates upon instruction of Syngenta in companies that are not directly or indirectly
	controlled by Syngenta;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	&ndash;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	up to 10 mandates in (i) charitable organizations, (ii) associations or foundations and (iii) other
	non-profit institutions.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Several mandates held in different
	companies of the same group count as 1 mandate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Mandates within companies under
	the direct or indirect control of Syngenta (subsidiaries) or which are not required to be registered in the Swiss Commercial Register
	or a similar foreign register are not limited by numbers.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Compensation
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 28
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Committee
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors consists of a maximum of 5 independent members
	of the Board of Directors. All members of the Compensation Committee shall be elected by the General Meeting of Shareholders individually.
	Their term of office shall end after completion of the next Annual General Meeting of Shareholders. Re-election is possible. The
	Compensation Committee constitutes itself and appoints its Chairperson.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Compensation Committee supports the Board of Directors in compensation-related matters for
	the Chairman of the Board of Directors, the members of the Board of Directors, the CEO and the members of the Executive Committee.
	In particular, it has the following responsibilities:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	reviews and recommends to the Board of Directors the compensation principles, strategy and policies
	which define the compensation system;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	defines the elements and the structure of the compensation system including the structure of share
	ownership plans;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	reviews and recommends to the Board of Directors on an annual basis a proposal for approval by
	the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders of the total compensation of the Board of Directors and the Executive Committee;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	pursuant to article 29, sets or amends the compensation packages of the members of the Executive
	Committee and prepares a proposal to the Board of Directors to set or amend the compensation package of the CEO;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	prepares and recommends to the Board of Directors the Compensation Report for approval.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	11
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage242"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors may assign additional tasks to the Compensation Committee and define its
	organization in the regulations governing the internal organization and the Compensation Committee charter.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Compensation
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 29
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The compensation policy and system are designed to attract and retain employees to deliver the
	Company&rsquo;s strategic plans and sustainable business performance.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors or the Compensation Committee determines the appropriate compensation levels
	for the Board of Directors and the Executive Committee, taking into account market data, position and level of responsibility and
	the achievement of business and individual performance measures.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Compensation may be paid by the Company or by its Group companies.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors shall submit separately and on an annual basis a proposal for approval by
	the General Meeting of Shareholders for the maximum total compensation of the:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Board of Directors for the period until the next Annual General Meeting of Shareholders;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Executive Committee for the current or subsequent business year.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the General Meeting of Shareholders rejects the proposal of the Board of Directors for the total
	compensation of the Board of Directors and/or the Executive Committee, the decision on how to proceed shall reside with the Board
	of Directors. The Board of Directors shall in particular have the options to convene an Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders
	to submit a new total compensation proposal, or determine the compensation for the current business year on an interim basis, subject
	to approval at the next Annual General Meeting of Shareholders.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Company or its Group companies may pay out compensation prior to the approval by the General
	Meeting of Share-holders subject to subsequent submission and approval.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The total compensation of the Board of Directors shall consist of an annual base fee and an additional
	fee for individual assignments to Committees of the Board of Directors. The Board of Directors may at the request of the Compensation
	Committee determine that the compensation of all or individual members of the Board of Directors be paid in part or in full in
	the form of shares that are either freely tradable or blocked for trading for a specific period. The value of such shares will
	be determined by the market price of a Syngenta share on the date of grant.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 13; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	12
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage243"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	8
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The total compensation of the Executive Committee shall consist of fixed and variable components.
	The fixed compensation consists of an annual base salary, plus additional benefits. The variable compensation may include short-term
	and long-term incentives, which may be cash and/or equity-based.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	9
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Short-term and long-term incentives are based on performance measures approved by the Board of
	Directors or the Compensation Committee. These measures may include the financial performance of the Group and/or a business segment,
	performance relative to the market, other companies or similar benchmarks, and/or individual performance.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	10
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The target amount for the short-term incentives is expressed as a percentage of the annual base
	salary. The actual payout may vary between 0 % and 200 % of the target amount, dependent on the achievement of performance measures.
	A minimum of 40 % and up to 80 % of the payout may be deferred and matched by the Company in equity.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The target amount for the long-term
	incentives may be expressed as a fixed amount, as a percentage of the annual base salary, or as a number of equity-based awards.
	The actual long-term incentive award may vary between 0 % and 150 % of the target amount.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors or the Compensation
	Committee deter-mines the target and matching ratio.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	11
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Equity-based compensation may include restricted or unrestricted shares, rights to receive shares
	or purchase shares (options) or rights to other comparable instruments which are subject to a vesting / blocking period of at least
	3 years. The value of equity-based compensation will be determined with reference to the market price of a Syngenta share on the
	date of grant in accordance with accepted valuation methods.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	12
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Short-term and long-term incentives, including terms and conditions of grant, vesting or blocking
	periods, terms and conditions of exercise, expiry and forfeiture, are governed by separate regulations, which are subject to approval
	by the Board of Directors or the Compensation Committee. Such regulations may in particular provide that equity-based compensation
	will vest and any blocking periods will be waived: (a) in the event of a change in control regarding the Company and (b) in the
	event of termination of employment of a member of the Executive Committee, unless the Compensation Committee decides otherwise.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 14; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	13
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage244"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	13
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Company is authorized to make payment to such members of the Executive Committee who (i) join
	the Executive Committee and/or (ii) are promoted from a member of the Executive Committee to CEO during a period for which the
	General Meeting of Shareholders has already approved the remuneration, if the total amount already approved by the General Meeting
	of Shareholders is not sufficient. The sum of all supplementary amounts may not exceed 40 % of the respective total amount of maximum
	remuneration for the respective business year as approved by the General Meeting of Shareholders. Such supplementary amount may
	also be used to compensate new members of the Executive Committee for loss of compensation or financial disadvantages caused by
	their change of employment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	D. External Auditor
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Term, powers
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 30
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	and duties
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The External Auditor, which shall
	be elected by the General Meeting of Shareholders each year, shall have the powers and duties vested in him by law.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 15; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

<B>
	Annual Financial Statements, Consolidated Financial Statements and Profit Allocation
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
