	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Business year
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<B>
	Article 31
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors determines
	the business year.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Business Report
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 32
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board of Directors shall prepare
	for each business year a Business Report consisting of the annual financial statements for the Company and on a consolidated level
	(including profit and loss statements, balance sheet and notes to the financial statements) and the Management Report. The Board
	of Directors shall determine the currency in which the consolidated financial statements are reported.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Allocation of profit
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 33
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	shown on the
</B>
</P>
<EFX_BALANCE_SHEET>
<A NAME="FIS_BALANCE_SHEET_2"></A>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
<B>
	balance sheet,
<BR>
	reserves
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The General Meeting of Shareholders subject
	to the legal provisions shall determine the allocation of profit shown on the balance sheet. The &#9;Board of Directors shall
	submit its proposals to the General Meeting of &#9;Shareholders.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_BALANCE_SHEET>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In addition to statutory reserves, additional reserves may be accrued.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Dividends not claimed within 5 years after the due date shall remain with the Company and be allocated
	to the general reserves.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

<B>
	Article 34
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Shareholder communications of the
	Company shall be made in the Swiss Commercial Gazette. The Board of Directors may designate additional forms of publication.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Place of jurisdiction
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 35
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 2IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The place of jurisdiction for any
	disputes arising from or in connection with the shareholdership in the Company shall be at the registered office of the Company.
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Preamble
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Based
	on articles 23 and 26 of the Articles of Incorporation, the Board of Directors issues the following Regulations Governing the
	Internal Organization (&ldquo;Regulations&rdquo;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	By
	these Regulations the Board of Directors defines the basic principles of the Company&rsquo;s organization, duties, powers, and
	responsibilities in accordance with the law and the Articles of Incorporation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	These
	Regulations have been approved by the Board of Directors on December 8, 2015, and enter into force on January 1, 2016, thereby
	replacing and superseding any previous versions of the Regulations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Company&rsquo;s Governance Bodies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	1
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Company&rsquo;s governance bodies are the following:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;&#9;the
	Board of Directors (hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;Board&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;&#9;the
	Governance &amp; Nomination Committee (hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;GNC&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;&#9;the
	Compensation Committee (hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;CC&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;&#9;the
	Audit Committee (hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;AC&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;&#9;the
	Corporate Responsibility Committee (hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;CRC&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;&#9;the
	Chairman of the Board (hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;Chairman&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;&#9;the
	Chief Executive Officer (hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;CEO&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;&#9;the
	Syngenta Executive Committee (hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;SEC&rdquo;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage251"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	B&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Board of Directors (Board)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	2
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board is the highest level of management in the Company, and exercises general supervision
	over the objectives and the conduct of business. It may issue any directives necessary
	for this purpose.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board formulates the agenda for the General Meeting of Shareholders and submits an Annual
	Report to it.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board issues the instructions necessary for the implementation of General Meeting of
	Shareholders&rsquo; resolutions.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board constitutes itself by appointing from among its members the Vice Chairman of the
	Board, the members of the Board Committees (except for the Compensation Committee) and
	the respective chairpersons, and the Board Secretary, who needs not be a Director.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In
	application of article 716b paragraph 1 of the Swiss Code of Obligations and article
	25 paragraph 2 of the Articles of Incorporation, the Board delegates powers and duties
	to the Board Committees constituted in these Regulations and the respective organizational
	charters in accordance with the law, the Company&rsquo;s Articles of Incorporation and
	the respective organizational charters.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In
	application of article 716b paragraph 1 of the Swiss Code of Obligations and article
	26 of the Articles of Incorporation, the Board delegates to the CEO and the SEC the authority
	to manage the Company&rsquo;s operations subject to applicable law, the Articles of Incorporation
	and the Regulations.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board may, upon giving appropriate notice to the relevant governance body or individuals,
	to whom it has, directly or indirectly, delegated any of its powers and duties, re-assume
	responsibility for such powers and duties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	3
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board decides on all business of the Company assigned to it by law, in particular the
	Swiss Code of Obligations, the Articles of Incorporation, and the Regulations.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 4 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

	&nbsp;
</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	At
	the request of the Chairman, the Board approves:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the
	strategic direction and the strategic plans of the Company;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the
	budget and other financial targets, and decides on the financial means necessary to attain
	those targets;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the
	corporate policy: this includes financial, investment, personnel, and safety and environmental
	protection policies;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the
	structure of the accounting systems, financial controls, financial planning and other
	internal controls;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	the

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	the
	essential features of the Company&rsquo;s organization;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	the
	duties and responsibilities of the governance bodies of the Company;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the
	quarterly reports and the Annual Report for the Company;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the
	Company&rsquo;s entry into new spheres of activity and withdrawal from existing ones;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the
	choice of new or the closing of existing sites of fundamental significance;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	acquisitions
	and divestments of assets, companies or businesses, other financial measures and any
	other business in accordance with the financial authorization levels set out in
<I>
<U>
	Appendix
	1
</U>
</I>
	;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the
	institution or settlement of legal proceedings in accordance with the financial authorization
	levels set out in
<I>
<U>
	Appendix 1
</U>
</I>
	;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the
	provision of any guarantee, surety or other security interest to any third party for
	existing or future debt and obligations of the Company in accordance with the financial
	authorization levels set out in
<I>
<U>
	Appendix 1
</U>
</I>
	;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	any
	other business in accordance with
<I>
<U>
	Appendices 1
</U>
</I>
	or
<I>
<U>
	2
</U>
</I>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	&nbsp;

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Further,
	the Board:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	appoints
	the CEO upon proposal by the GNC, the further members of the SEC and the Head Internal
	Audit; the Board may also order their removal from office;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.75IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	designates
	those authorized to sign for the Company.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	4
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board is kept informed by the CEO of all Company matters of fundamental significance.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	members of the Board enjoy the rights of information as laid down in article 715a of
	the Swiss Code of Obligations.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	5
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board meets at the invitation of its Chairman as often as business requires, however
	not less than once per quarter. Any member of the Board may submit a written request
	that a meeting be convened.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Invitations
	to meetings of the Board are issued at least 5 working days in advance, as a rule.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Chairman, after consultation with the CEO, determines the agenda for the meetings. The
	agenda is sent to the members of the Board together with the invitation.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any
	member of the Board may request the inclusion of items of business in the agenda. Such
	requests must be submitted to the Chairman in writing at least 10 days before the date
	of the meeting.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 6 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage254"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	6
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board is quorate when at least one half of the total number of its members is present
	in person. The resolutions of the Board are adopted by a simple majority of the votes
	of the members present. In the event of equality of votes, the Chairman has the casting
	vote. Resolutions by means of a written circular or by video-/teleconference are permissible.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	No
	representation of absent members of the Board is permissible.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Resolutions
	on items of business not on the agenda of a meeting require the affirmative vote of two-thirds
	of the members present at that meeting.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Secretary of the Board takes minutes of the meetings of the Board and of any written
	resolutions.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Members
	of the Board are obliged to leave the meeting room and abstain from deliberating or deciding
	on any matter that affects or reasonably might affect the interests of such member or
	of persons or entities closely related to such member. It is the responsibility of each
	member to inform the Chairman and the Secretary of the Board in case of a potential conflict
	of interest. The obligations set forth in this provision also apply to the work carried
	out in Board Committees.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Members
	of the Board may not reveal to third parties anything they learn of during the exercise
	of their duties. This obligation continues even after their terms of office have expired.
	Physical business documents must be returned, electronic files containing any business
	document must be deleted by the expiry of the term of office at the latest.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	7
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	members of the Board are listed in the Commercial Register. Out of the members of the Board only the GNC members are authorized,
	jointly by two, to sign on behalf of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 7 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage255"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	C&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Governance &amp; Nomination Committee (GNC)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	8
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	GNC oversees corporate governance issues at Company level, supports the Board in the identification and selection of candidates
	for the Board and the CEO position. Further, it regularly reviews the independence of the Board and manages the Board&rsquo;s
	self-assessment process.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	9
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board appoints the members of the GNC for a term of 1 year.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	GNC shall consist of the Chairman, who shall act as Chairperson of the GNC, and up to
	3 independent, non-executive members of the Board. The Group General Counsel or his/her
	delegate shall act as Secretary of the GNC.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	10
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	responsibilities and the organization of the GNC are set forth in the GNC Charter, which is subject to approval by the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	D&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Compensation Committee (CC)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	11
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	CC shall carry out the Board&rsquo;s overall responsibility for drawing up the executive
	compensation principles, strategy and policies covering the CEO and the SEC.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	CC shall also draw up the principles for the compensation of non-executive&nbsp;members
	of the Board and the Chairman.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	12
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	All
	members of the CC are appointed by the General Meeting of Shareholders upon proposal
	from the Board for a term of 1 year.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	CC shall consist of a minimum of 3 independent, non-executive members of the Board. The
	Chairman shall not be a member of the CC. The Head HR or his/her delegate shall act as
	Secretary of the CC.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	13
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	responsibilities and the organization of the CC in the area of compensation are set forth in the CC Charter, which is subject
	to approval by the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	E&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Audit Committee (AC)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	14
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	AC assists the Board in fulfilling its supervisory responsibilities with respect to accounting and financial reporting practices
	of the Company. It also recommends decisions on selected financial measures to the Board. The AC maintains effective working relationships
	with the Board, Syngenta&rsquo;s management and the internal and external auditors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	15
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Board appoints the members of the AC for a term of 1 year.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	AC shall consist of at least 3 independent, non-executive members of the Board. The Chairman
	is not eligible as a member of the AC. The Board elects the Chairperson of the AC. The
	Group General Counsel or his/her delegate shall act as Secretary of the AC.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	AC as a team must have financial or auditing expertise to carry out its responsibilities.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	Article
	16
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	The
	responsibilities and the organization of the AC are set forth in the AC Charter, which is subject to approval by the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	F&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Corporate Responsibility Committee (CRC)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	17
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	CRC acts as custodian of the Board in corporate responsibility matters and exercises oversight over the SEC in this respect.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	18
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;

</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	The
	Board appoints the members of the CRC for a term of 1 year.
</FONT>
</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	CRC shall consist of the Chairman, at least 2 further independent, non-executive members
	of the Board, and the CEO. The Board appoints the Chairperson. The Group General Counsel
	or his/her delegate shall act as Secretary of the CRC.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	19
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	responsibilities and the organization of the CRC are set forth in the CRC Charter, which is subject to approval by the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	G&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Chairman of the Board (Chairman)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	20
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Chairman leads the Board in the exercise of its non-transferable duties, including the
	ultimate management and oversight of the Company, the exercise of its organizational
	and financial responsibility, the appointment and removal of members of the SEC, and
	the proposals to the General Meeting of Shareholders.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Chairman, together with the CEO, assumes overall responsibility for the development of
	the Company&rsquo;s strategies and ensures the close alignment and common understanding
	between the Board, its Committees, the CEO and the SEC of such strategies and their implementation.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	On
	behalf of the Board, the Chairman exercises ongoing oversight and governance over the
	CEO and through him also over the SEC.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Chairman organizes and chairs the General Meeting of Shareholders and acts a steward
	and guardian for the shareholders between meetings.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Chairman defines the agenda of the Board meetings in coordination with the CEO. He organizes
	and chairs the meetings of the Board and ensures that the business of the Board and its
	Committees proceeds in an orderly fashion.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Internal
	Audit reports directly to the Chairman. The Head Internal Audit has regular one-on-one
	meetings with the Chairman to share his/her findings and receive input on his/her functional
	priorities.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Chairman, together with the CEO, manages the reputation of the Company, and represents
	the interests of the Company to important stakeholders and the general public.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	8
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Chairman approves external mandates of the members of the SEC as set forth in article
	27 paragraph 2 of the Company&rsquo;s Articles of Incorporation.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	9
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Should
	the Chairman be unable to carry out his duties, the Vice Chairman shall act in his stead.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	H&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	21
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	CEO shares responsibility for the strategic direction of the Company with the Chairman.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	CEO leads the SEC. The members of the SEC are directly responsible to the CEO.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	CEO and the SEC are jointly responsible for the active leadership and the operative management
	of the Company.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	CEO is directly responsible to the Chairman and the Board for efficient and effective
	work of the SEC.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The

	the interests of the Company to important stakeholders and the general public.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	CEO forwards proposals to the Chairman, the Board or its Committees to the extent a subject
	matter falls within their respective remit.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	I&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Syngenta Executive Committee (SEC)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	22
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Under
	the leadership of the CEO, the SEC is responsible for the active leadership and the operative
	management of the Company.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Each
	member of the SEC is responsible for the management of his/her function, and all members
	of the SEC are collectively responsible for decisions taken as a Committee.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	SEC consists of:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Each
	member of the SEC must work in close cooperation with the other members. Each member
	of the SEC reports to, and is responsible to, the CEO in respect of his/her function.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	SEC meets whenever business requires. Resolutions are adopted by a majority of votes
	cast. In the event of equality of votes, the CEO has the casting vote.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	23
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Secretary of the SEC takes minutes of the meetings of the SEC and of any written resolutions. The CEO nominates the Secretary
	of the SEC; this person need not be a member of the SEC.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	24
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	duties of the SEC comprise in particular:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ndash;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	formulation
	of the fundamentals of corporate policy;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

	&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	designing
	the Company strategy and strategic plans for the approval of the Board;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&nbsp;

</P>

	implementation
	of the strategies, strategic plans and the periodic assessment of the attainment of goals;
</FONT>

</TABLE>

</FONT>

</TABLE>

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	acquisitions
	and divestments of assets, companies or businesses, other financial measures and any
	other business in accordance with the financial authorization levels set out in
<I>
<U>
	Appendix
	1
</U>
</I>
	;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	the
	institution or settlement of legal proceedings in accordance with the financial authorization
	levels set out in
<I>
<U>
	Appendix 1
</U>
</I>
	;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

<I>

</U>

<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	J&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Internal
	Audit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="COLOR: #00A0BE; FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article
	25
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 14PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	As
	an inspecting and monitoring body, Internal Audit carries out operational audits (administrative
	procedures) and system audits. In this connection, the periodical and systematic checking
	of financial reporting is of particular importance. All organizational units, associated
	companies, and foundations are subject to audit.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Internal
	Audit is assigned its duties by the AC. It submits its reports to the Chairperson of
	the AC.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	Head Internal Audit reports to the Chairman of the Board.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any
	suspected irregularities must be reported without delay.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC BOLD 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
<U>
	Appendix
	1
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC BOLD 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Financial
	Authorization Levels
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Investments/divestments
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
